name: Pragmatists
tagline: Software. We're just getting it done.
description:
We are Pragmatists and we mean it. We're experts in software development in Java and modern Web. We create bespoke web solutions using agile project management methods and a very strict quality-oriented development process and programming techniques like Test-Driven Development and Pair-Programming.
We value transparency and direct communication with our clients, so you will have direct access to your development team. And yes - all our programmers speak very good English.
Our team consists only of experienced professionals. We understand that the future of your product is in our hands, so we make sure to choose the right people for the job.
Complete development cycle means world to us - we know how to define the product and shape the work scope. We employ User Experience experts to make sure your product is not only beautiful but first and foremost usable. Then we develop and can maintain and enhance your system after the project is ready.
